meanings.definition: Plural of palazzo: a large, impressive building or residence, especially in Italy.
meanings.sent1: The palazzi in Italy are grand and beautiful structures.
meanings.sent2: We visited the historic palazzi during our trip to Italy.
meanings.sent3: The palazzi seemed to be competing to see which one was the most magnificent.
meanings.sent4: The row of palazzi stood tall like giants guarding the city.
meanings.sent5: The palazzi gleamed in the sunlight, showcasing their elegance and splendor.
